casebody.data:
In the Matter of ORPHEUM CIRCUIT, Inc., Bankrupt. No. 187. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 19, 1938. Jules C. Randal, of Buffalo, N. Y., for Philip J. Snyder, as trustee, etc. Beekman, Bogue, Leake, Stephens & Black, of New York City (Edward K. Hanlon, Douglas M. Black, and Milton Weiss, all of New York City, of counsel), pro se, and for respondent Marcus Heiman, successor trustee.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
